Configuring wsprdaemon: wsprdaemon.conf

The template for a wsprdaemon.conf file, located in /home/wsprdaemon/wsprdaemon/, includes tons of stuff and looks dauntingly complicated. However, it boils down to setting up the following:

  • computer-related parameters

  • receiver definitions

  • ka9q-radio parameters

  • reporting parameters

  • a schedule

Example wsprdaemon.conf
